Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable item at a discounted rate. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction with you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
